Hint.name: Event Hint
Hint.description: One hint on puzzle type events (e.g. #code)

Role.name: Cool Role Color
Role.description: A special role for a week, can be any hex color you provide but cannot be similar to existing roles.

Nitro.name: Discord Nitro
Nitro.description: A prepaid card for one month of Discord Nitro. Please note it must be spent on Nitro.
